it.uniba.main

Class Arguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.main.Arguments

  • public class Arguments
extends java.lang.Object
    The input parameters class. This class parses the input parameters. Entity

        The tag string.

      • limit

        private long limit
        The limit number to the query output.

      • edge

        private boolean edge
        The edge. If true, enables edges in the query. Default option is false.

      • weight

        private boolean weight
        The weight. The option to show weights in the edges' output. Default option is false.

      • user

        private long user
        The user. The user id of the user whom created the post.

        The regular expression used to parse the arguments.
